attributes.action: Uncover the 2nd half of Amphitheatre & stop CWAC selling land to build on
attributes.background: Cheshire West and Chester council plan  to sell lease (150 year) for commercial gain & allow old Convent to be disposed of, probably demolished & build on top of half of amphitheatre rather than allow excavation and allow amphitheatre to be uncovered in full for whole world to see

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also send your petition to Cheshire West and Chester Council here: http://www.cheshirewestandchester.gov.uk/your%20council/consultations%20and%20petitions/petitions.aspx
